resources.string: Five types of daily food plan
Five types of daily food plan
Five types of daily food plan
Five types of daily food plan
Five types of daily food plan

Breakfast


1. 1 cup fortified Bran Flakes
 2. 1 cup Skim or Soymilk 
 3. 1 medium Banana
 4. 0.5 cup Egg , scrambled


Snack #1


1. 1 cup Soy Yogurt
 2. 2 tbsp granola
 3. 0.2 cup raisin


Lunch


1. pizza(medium)/pasta(1 bowl)
 2. 2 tbsp Tomato Salsa (low sodium)
 3. 1 cup Fruit Salad
 4. chicken(1cup) 


Snack #2


1. 1 cup Blueberries, fresh
 2. 5 Whole Wheat Crackers 


Dinner


1. 0.5 cup Whole Wheat Pasta
 2. 0.5 cup regular Pasta
 3. 0.6 cup Tomato Sauce (low sodium)
 4. 1 tbsp Garlic
 5. 0.25 cup fresh Cilantro
 6. 6 Soy ‘Meatballs’
 7. 1 small Garden Salad (mixed lettuce, tomatoes, carrots)
 8. 2 tbsp Salad Dressing (with fat)


Snack #3


1. cup Light Vanilla Soymilk
 2. sheets Graham Crackers

Breakfast


1. 12 oz. Coffee (w/ caffeine)
 2. 1 cup Milk (skim)
 3. 1 package Instant Oatmeal
 4. 1 Orange


Snack #1


1. 1 cup Cottage Cheese (1%; no/low sodium)
 2. 0.5 cup peaches (raw)


Lunch


1. 2 slices Whole Wheat Bread
 2. 2 oz. Turkey Breast (white, low sodium)
 3. 0.5 cup Alfalfa Sprouts
 4. 0.2 cup Tomato
 5. 1 cubic inch Cheddar Cheese
 6. 0.2 cup Lettuce


Snack #2


1.1 Medium Banana
 2. 2 tbsp. Peanut Butter (natural)


Dinner

 1. 5 oz. Tilapia
 2. 0.25 cup Fresh Cilantro
 3. 1 cup Steamed Brown Rice
 4. 0.5 cup Mixed Steamed Broccoli
 5. Yellow Squash
 6. 1 small Salad
 7. 2 tbsp Fat Free Dressing

Breakfast

 1. Fruits(1.5 cups)/Fruit juice(250ml)
 2. 1 bowl vegetable/ vegetable oats 
 3. Cheese 1cup
 4. 1 Egg/ 2 chicken broast
 5. Multigrain bread/ wheat bran flakes/ corn flakes (5 ounces)


Mid morning

 1. Fruit juice(250ml)/ yogurt(1 cup)


Lunch

 1. Rice(1.5 cup)/ nun/ Paratha 
 2. pulse/egg curry(1 cup)
 3. Curd(1 cup)
 4. Vegetable(1.5 cups)

 Snacks

 1. biscuit/roasted chana/ peas(1 cup)
 2. Sandwitch/vegetable roll/Burger
 3. Soup

 Dinner

 1. Rice/ nun/ Paratha(1 cup) 
 2. pulse/egg curry
 3. chicken/fish(1 cup)
 4. Curd/sweet dishes(1 cup)

Breakfast


1. 1 cup Milk (skim)
 2. 1 c Strawberries (fresh)
 3. 1 Bagel (whole wheat)
 4. 2 tbsp Cream Cheese
 5. 0.1 c raisins (seedless)


Snack #1


1. 1 medium Apple
 2. 0.25 cup whole Almonds


Lunch 

 1. 1 cup Cranberry Juice (light)
 2. 1 Whole Wheat Pitha
 3. 3 oz. Light Tuna (in water)
 4. 1 tbsp Mayo (light)
 5. 0.25 cup sliced Tomato
 6. 0.2 cup Spinach Leaves (raw)
 7. 1 medium Orange


Snack #2


1. 1 cup cauliflower (fresh, raw)
 2. 1 tbsp veggie dip


Dinner 

 1. 4 oz. Chicken Breast 
 2. 1 tbsp Lemon Juice (fresh)
 3. 1 tbsp Ground Pepper (fresh)
 4. 1 small Sweet Potato (baked)
 5. 1 small Salad
 - 0.2 cup cucumber
 - 0.2 cup diced tomato
 - 0.2 cup diced sweet peppers
 - 1 tbsp lemon juice
 - 1 tsp parsley (dried)
 6. 1 small Whole Wheat Roll


Snack #3


1. 1 cup Plain, Non fat Yogurt
 2. 1 cup Blueberries

Breakfast


1. 1 bowl vegetable/bread
 2. Cheese 30g
 3. fruit juice

 Mid morning

 1. Fruit juice/yogurt

Lunch
 1. Rice/ nun/ Paratha 
 2. pulse/egg curry
 3. Curd

 Snacks

 1. biscuit/roasted chana/ peas
 2. Sandwitch
 3. Soup

 Dinner

 1. Rice/ nun/ Paratha 
 2. pulse/egg curry/chicken/fish
 3. Curd
